description.value:
A dim, blue glow surrounds you, protecting from attacks, granting you resistance to spells cast by chaotic creatures, and slowing chaotic creatures when they strike you. This abjuration has four effects.

  • First, you gain a +4 deflection bonus to AC and a +4 resistance bonus on saves. Unlike protection from chaos, this benefit applies against all attacks, not just against attacks by chaotic creatures.
  • Second, you gain Spell Resistance 25 against chaotic spells and spells cast by chaotic creatures.
  • Third, the abjuration protects you from possession and mental influence, just as protection from chaos does.
  • Finally, if a chaotic creature succeeds on a melee attack against you, the attacker is slowed (Will save negates, as the slow spell, but against shield of law‘s save DC).
